author: psmith
msg: Now that log4j 1.2.16 has the new createSocket method, we can trap this, store the details
of the port/address, and use that in the broadcast of what the SocketHubAppender is listening on.
Includes test case.  Changed dependency on zeroconf to require log4j 1.2.16-SNAPSHOT until release.

author: varlax
msg: Moved Jitrino.OPT to dynamic runtime-binded interfaces.

author: esm
msg: Updating Pluto 1.1.x pluto-site with news and updates, etc. from trunk.
